website_summaries.verdict: This hardshell backpack is built for comfort and support.
pros: Equipped with a compression-molded back panel for added comfort
Boasts a weatherproof exoskeleton that protects against sleet, snow, rain, and other inclement weather conditions
Comes with sleek, versatile shoulder straps
cons: Front zipper is weak and flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Well made, well padded, but too big for my Envy 17
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, it's unbelievably hard to find a laptop backpack that both actually fits and actually protects a 17" laptop. Of all the ones I tried, this was the most rugged and well padded. However, it's designed for a VERY beefy 17" (gaming) rig, and it's a bit bulky and heavy. My HP Envy 17 is certainly not a small machine, but it was swimming inside this backpack, and there's no strap to hold it in place. So I'm returning it in favor of something a little more svelte. I did love the fact that it stands up by itself.
customer_reviews.author: capnhairdo

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack, awesome functionality, aquaphobic
customer_reviews.text: great quality, durable, and looks awesome. materials used to construct this backpack are fantastic. I use it for my Mac and law books while on my sport bike. straps are secure and bag is extremely water resistant/aquaphobic (no bag is really water proof) I got stuck in a heavy down pour while riding and I was soaked, but the bag repelled 95% of the rain and all my documents and CPU was dry and secure. ***side note: If you plan on subjecting this backpack to the elements like me, I suggest applying some camp dry or water repellant spray to the fabric of this pack to aid in longevity of your investment and protect your contents!**
customer_reviews.author: Awwex

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, awesome capacity, solid design!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. It's REALLY nice for airport travel. The backpack is solidly armored and holds its shape wonderfully, it's got an well-thought-out internal design with tons of pockets of many different sizes that can accommodate pretty much any piece of technology or accessories. The zippers unzip really far down toward the bottom of the bag so it's extremely easy to access stuff you may have stored in the bottom of your bag. This backpack is solid and a great deal - I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: The Overlord

customer_reviews.title: If you frequently carry a lot of electronics and can handle a super tall backpack, this may be the one for you!
customer_reviews.text: Has all the storage you can ask for, protects your electronics quite well (both from the rain, and from knocking around), and despite being super tall, is relatively slim all things considered. Unlike other backpacks that aren't designed specifically for electronics, this backpack has relatively few places in which the bag can rip (something my other favorite bags: The North Face Recon have all done in one or more places). Finally, the backpack just seems "well balanced" when carrying heavy electronics (such as the namesake Legion laptop), thus reducing strain on your back and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell mileaf

customer_reviews.title: Get a lot of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, my friends call it the Mercedes of computer bags! :D The only downside is the hard mesh covering the back. It seems that this is a practice now for all computer bag makers. That mesh ruined few hoodies from the friction. I get a star off for that! I don't sweat like a pig, I don't need this stupid mesh! Realistically how many of you sweat carrying a computer backpack? Usually the distances are not too fat away for carrying the computer. Usually office - home, home - coffee shop, home - library. That mesh doesn't even help in the sun with the sweating.
customer_reviews.author: GT

customer_reviews.title: The tank of all backpacks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack because I ride an electric longboard and want something strong to protect my Lenovo Y520. Upon looking at the backpack for the first time, I can confirm the aesthetic and the interior is amazing. Sometimes we see pictures of products online, and when they show up at our doorsteps they don't quite meet our expectations, but for this backpack, it even looks better in person! I haven't fallen on my board yet (knock on wood), but knowing that I have this backpack my laptop will have more chances to see another day. Overall, for the price, I think this was the best backpack purchase I've made--ever. Great design, quality and overall AFFORDABLE! Great job, Lenovo!
customer_reviews.author: Quang Duong

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bag, Until It Isn't
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty psyched about getting this bag, however it has now only been close to 5 months since I've had this bag, and it's starting to fall apart. I plan on requesting an RMA (once I can figure out where to do so) because I love how solid this can can be. It's good and stiff and stands on its own when you need to to, however the arm mesh has come free from the stitching, and I don't really have the skill set to repair it myself, otherwise I would. It's a great bag otherwise, but if it's falling apart after less than 5 months, that's a bit concerning. That being said, someone else's mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: i really like this backpack,  good materials
customer_reviews.text: The materials on this backpack actually feel great. The laptop also fits very nicely inside. Good amount of compartments. The bottom of the bag feels like it will keep my laptop in good shape. The front of the backpack is a hard like compound. But overall i really enjoy this backpack. The only thing i would say i don't like about this laptop is that the main opening of the bag doesn't open all the way. Also no chest strap. I think if this had a chest strap this would be an amazing backpack. But! Overall an amazing back pack. Great materials and looks good too!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very oversized 15.6 inch laptop that doesn't fit in any 15.6 Inch bag I have seen, and I wanted a backpack since I commute by bike. The main compartment feels like it could possibly hold both of my laptops, and there's plenty of room in the accessories compartment for power adapters, etc. Haven't tested durability or water resistance (as I don't want to risk equipment unnecessarily) but overall it looks like it'll do the job for me. Of course, the roominess and vinyl protection come at the cost of weight, as this bag is heavy by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Davis

customer_reviews.title: The zips are not that good and some times hard to open
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the toughest bag i came across. I own targus bag pack and thought to change brand cause i have a 17' Lenovo Y700. The front shell is tough and the back compartment for laptop is heavily protected. The cons are minor but i think they should improve it. The zips are not that good and some times hard to open. Also some rubber base at bottom would have been better to avoid tear when you put your bag down. Overall this bag is perfect for big laptops and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Primus

customer_reviews.title: Best Laptop Bag ive owned
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Lenovo 710 14" 2 in 1. It's overkill for what I need but works perfect. main reason i chose this one is it has multiple sleeve options and I found a sleeve that fits the 14" perfect. It has plenty of space for other gear and the material feels to be of good quality and is just as good if not better than laptop bags double the price. I am super happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Allen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag. I use this for my MSI 17 ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag. I use this for my MSI 17 inch gaming monster of a laptop. Fits with a cooling pad, mouse, redragon 10 keyless mech keyboard, Astro A40's (It REALLY helps that they swing outward and flatten out) mouse pad and a few other gadgets. This thing is great and keeps things safe. Its heavy with all this stuff, but hey what can you do, Its ALOT of stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect backpack for laptop and travel!
customer_reviews.text: My fiance and I needed new backpacks for carrying our laptops, especially when traveling and visiting family. These are awesome! They easily fit 17" laptops (as pictured), as well as offer enough room to pack other belongings. I was able to fit my laptop, a keyboard, headset, 2 days' worth of clothes, and basic hygiene stuff (shampoo, conditioner, deodorant, etc.) without any trouble. My fiance was able to fit the same things in his pack. **The decal isn't included. We ordered some to differentiate between the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Pet

customer_reviews.title: Seam coming apart after light use - 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I've had the bag for a month. I don't put it through anything strenuous, nor do I mistreat my bags, and there is a large tear at the seam near the top of the bag. I literally only carry the bag into work from my car and back out to my car. The rest of the bag seems good, but this is poor quality control for the breakdown shown in the picture. If the seller was to replace the bag at no cost for one without he manufacturer fault, I would consider this bag a quality, good-looking bag that is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Love the backpack. Suites my Lenovo Legion Y520. I got to say it's pretty bulky. Doesn't bother me though. If you have a 17 laptop this would fit that as well. Plus the padded front for added protection. There's bunch of pockets for your accessories. no bad feedback so far.
customer_reviews.author: thereisnocowlevel

customer_reviews.title: City survivor
customer_reviews.text: It was smaller than expected a little, and not the actual color. I actually prefer the color it came in; which is darker. It was too light originally. The size is good enough for my needs in a city type area. Got one complement for the choice after one day. Its rare to find something i like so its good i don't have to make my own this time. I never had this laptop but i love the legion lego. I don't know yet how it is in the rain. Another thing i love is the shoulder strap. Its the best comfortable one i ever felt. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S.

customer_reviews.title: Everything has a place...
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack! Get lots of compliments on it. It has pockets for everything including water bottles. The cool thing is you get to see the creators intent for each pocket as they have little symbols to show you where everything goes. There’s even a pocket for full sized headphones. Laptop compartment fits my 15.6” Thinkpad keeping it snug and secure. Shoulder straps are comfy with plenty of padding. Great bag for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Pierce

customer_reviews.title: I really love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bag. At first, the zipper on the front was INCREDIBLY difficult to open. It would keep getting stuck on the lining. Eventually though, it stopped doing this, thankfully. There are so many compartments, so it's easy to stay organized. It looks sleek and fits everything I throw into it. My laptop feels secure, and it even has a sleeve (for an iPad) that I use to carry my privacy screen. This is pretty much the best bag I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Serra Abak

customer_reviews.title: It has great padding and 17" laptop fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and this is what he had to say. The Lenovo Legion Armored 17 inch Gaming Backpack is all and more. My 17" lap top fits perfectly with extra space remaining and It is well cushioned. There is plenty of extra compartments for my books and note books along with small compartments with zippers and elastic trim for supporting items. When placed on the floor it stands up straight even if all I have in it is my lap top. It doesn't fall towards the weighted side it balances perfectly. I don't have to worry about it raining cause it's water resistant. I am happy with this back pack I highly recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Aracely Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack in general, lots of room and still has a slim profile. Great protection as well, the shell on the outside is not as hard as I expected but still does an amazing job. Get compliments on it all the time, everyone thinks it's a kobe (mamba logo) bag. Highly recommend watching the youtube videos on this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: parm

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack
customer_reviews.text: The backpack is very good quality and has many pockets. I own an acer predator 17in. This computer fits (barely). I would like a little more protection on the bottom because the corners seem a little exposed. When a gaming computer with charger is in the bag it starts getting full, now it can hold a lot but it is not meant to hold things like textbooks along with a gaming computer. Overall it seems very solid when my computer is in it and it moderate in the comfort department, my biggest complaint is that fory computer it seems almost tight. Also I believe the Lenovo gaming computers are slightly smaller than mine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eye catching
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this backpack in general. It has many pockets and dividers, but it lacks a bit of portability as a cost. I had a bit of trouble with it when I traveled with it. It is really eye-catching and many people ask me where I got it from and they like it. Other than that it is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Hamzahjeddin

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for
customer_reviews.text: Comfort wise this backpack was great. But honestly, the spacing inside this backpack is awful. And after one year of owning this backpack the zippers in the main pocket have broken off. I carry my mousepad, mouse, external mini half keyboard and laptop along with its charger and it simply was not enough space in the end. For a “gaming” backpack I should easily be able to carry all these things without having the issues with the zipper. It was okay while it lasted but now I have to buy another backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Niekou

customer_reviews.title: Backpack to cause cancer? NOT FOR ME!
customer_reviews.text: Big sign saying contains substances known to cause cancer! Smelled like chemicals. Returned promptly
customer_reviews.author: Roald

customer_reviews.title: 15.6 inch laptop backpack
customer_reviews.text: I went with the other backpack that’s not for 17inch laptop, which still looks like it could fit a 17inch laptop! This bag is amazing for 15.6 inch laptops. The quality and space is perfect. I’m a huge gamer and do a whole lot of traveling. You won’t be disappointed. I posted a couple pictures that can hopefully determine your choice of buying.
customer_reviews.author: Kalvin Pettengill

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Took it on a trip to Ireland, Poland, and Moldova. Packed great, fit under the airplane seat, Tough made. I did put a sticker on the Lenovo logo. Cripes, why do I want to advertise the contents of my backpack?
customer_reviews.author: Vexxed

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and nice.
customer_reviews.text: Tt's designed for a VERY beefy 17" (gaming) rig, and it's a bit bulky and heavy. My HP Envy 17 is certainly not a small machine, but it was swimming inside this backpack, and there's no strap to hold it in place. So I'm returning it in favor of something a little more svelte. I did love the fact that it stands up by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Malus

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable deal!
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted a backpack that could fit my laptop plus work items and empty my pockets through the workday, and maybe hold up on my motorcycle if I got caught in the rain. I didn't not expect it to be this good. And for the price? Are you kidding me? I've spent well over a hundred on laptop bags and backpacks nowhere near this good. This is hands down the best laptop bag I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey David Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: This is my second review of this product. First time i gave 5 ★. But now i gave 3 ★. Yes, i guess it good for money. But it's not perfect. When i carry this bag in my shoulde. It always slip. Its very annoyin. Thats why i gave 3★
customer_reviews.author: Nur A Farabi

customer_reviews.title: Big backpack for big laptop
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than my slim backpack, but provides more protection with thick padding. Fits my giant Acer Helios 500 perfectly and plenty of room for other stuff. Dedicated spot for headset! I wished the whole backpack is cover in armor. Overall its a nice "GAMING" backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for hauling a heavy laptop with components
customer_reviews.text: I've used it about a week now and its very comfortable and holds my oversized Alienware 18" laptop very well. For the price its fantastic. There is not the most room in the upper 2 compartments when a laptop is inside the main compartment, but enough room for a charger, mouse and cables easily. The laptop compartment has padding and I dont feel like my laptop will get shattered when I place my bag down or climb out of a car holding it etc.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Childs

customer_reviews.title: Better than the $100+ laptop armored backpacks by gaming brands by a longshot!
customer_reviews.text: The backpack that may not have a name widely synonymous with gaming, but is the best made backpack of its class! It's the lowest costing bag to protect your 17.6in or smaller laptop, but the construction is more durable and lasting of them all! Beats out the $100+ backpacks of brands you associate with gaming out by a longshot!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Corbitt

customer_reviews.title: Awesomesauce
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It is very durable,made out of strong material. I was able to fit my headset,mouse,keyboard,power supply,external HDD,battery pack,speakers and my laptop comfortably inside and still had room for a bag of chips. Grade A quality product couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Wayne Mosier

customer_reviews.title: Trustworthy for your gaming laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bag, it's huge but not bulky. Bought to protect an Hp OMEN X laptop, and it fits perfectly. Well padded, absolutely can trust the laptop compartment. Materials are fine, wish the straps were nicer but overall very rugged. If you carry a large gaming laptop (omen X, alienware 17r4) get this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Assault Kittens

customer_reviews.title: They had one job! Project the computer... fail
customer_reviews.text: Great cushion for comfortability. Fits my gigantic 17 inch MSI. One major design flaw... the bottom of the backpack where the laptop touches the floor is one layer of cloth! Seriously guys? These backpacks store really expensive computers and you went cheap on the part that touches the floor? Come on! I have to take mine to get retrofitted with extra protection. SMH...
customer_reviews.author: Maker

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tested the waterproof durability, but so far the bag is very sturdy and has lots of inner pockets. Very stylish also, gotten compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Excelent for travel and durability
customer_reviews.text: By far the best backpack i have purchased to hold my valuables, i travel a lot for work and this pack has by far exceeded my expectation. All the compartments inside are great for keeping all your devices organized and easily accessible. 10/10 seriously no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Evan D

customer_reviews.title: Good bag. Too small than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is smaller than I thought. The zipper on the front where the hard part is is kinda hard to operate both opening and closing. The zipper gets stuck on the corner and I have to give it some force to open.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Great mid-size laptop bag.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for my legion y730. I have room for everything I need, and its perfect for travel and flying.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Mullins

customer_reviews.title: The Red TARDIS
customer_reviews.text: Has yet to fall apart, holds all my stuff. This bag is really cool with a bunch of features Lenovo sadly fails to mention. Inside the bag, there is a strap to hold your headphones, a mesh pocket for adapters, and a bunch of other pockets. I have been able to fit an ungodly amount of stuff in the bag including a medium-sized mechanical keyboard. Definitely a worthy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack, holds laptop, college books and accessories, well made
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we were looking for to help my son through his college experience. It has plenty of room for everything and has been constructed very well so it should hold up for some time.
customer_reviews.author: William Black

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This company sell cheap product and on top charge you as well restocking fee of 30% stay away people.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Get it, it;s worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so worth it. I had it for over three years now and it goes anywhere I need to go with my laptop and it stood the test of time with no tears, pealing or basically any damage.
customer_reviews.author: anthony khan

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: This is an exceptionally well made big bag. Absolutely met and exceeded my expectations. Brilliantly designed and executed. Well done Lenovo.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Saint John

customer_reviews.title: Great for laptop and game gear
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The only thing is I really can’t fit anything more than my laptop and gaming stuff. I usually can squeeze one textbook and one small notebook in for school when I don’t need my controller, headphones etc. On the up side it has exceptional organization on the inside with labeled pockets and straps to keep things from shifting too much.
customer_reviews.author: Kt

customer_reviews.title: Multi puter backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I searched hi and low. Didn’t want to pay a crazy amount with a 50/50 chance it works. It’s perfect. Holds my iPad Air 2 tightly inside one pocket, my Acer switch alpha 12 tightly into another pocket. And the kicker my Acer Predator Helios 300 15.6. Like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Malibu

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for everyday
customer_reviews.text: Great bag to hold what you need for work or just light moving around, not enough space for travel in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: joe jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality and value. The backpack is so big it accomodated an Asus Vega64 card in the original box, a 17" mobile workstation, some of my belongings and still there was a plenty of space left. The only downside is that straps could've been wider and more solid, as the backpack could easily hold a 20+ lbs worth of load. Cuts into shoulders a bit when loaded like that.
customer_reviews.author: Mykola Pliashechnykov

customer_reviews.title: The Best of the Best
customer_reviews.text: It is the besting gaming backpack I have ever had! I've dropped it, walked through a rain shower, and traveled cross country with it (all with my PS4 in it) and it has not failed me once! I love it and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Ksyniak

customer_reviews.title: Good padding and protection for your laptop
customer_reviews.text: Good padding and protection for your laptop, but the zippers are the WORST quality I have ever had. Broke within five months.. Literally just broke walking in the cold. I am very dissappointed and will not be buying another one of these again.
customer_reviews.author: Gage

customer_reviews.title: Received the bag this week and love it! Quality is outstanding and it is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the bag this week and love it! Quality is outstanding and it is very comfortable to wear even when filled to the top with equipment. Only caveat is the limited space which is not stressed enough. But as the measurements are given beforehand, I don't subtract a star.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: So even though it looks like a hard case it's really not. I wish it was. But it is pretty useful. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Randomson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This Bag is very sturdy , I love the have shell. Very big bag I hold an gaming laptop and my work laptop without any issues
customer_reviews.author: Kdash

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my 15 inch legion laptop. Has just the right amount of storage for all of my cables, external Hard Drive's, headphones controllers etc. A full battle station in a bag!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rego

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack.
customer_reviews.text: This bag has solved several issues, I take with me my laptop + tablet + notebook & some stationary while I’m going to work or collage, a very comfort to carry regardless the mass.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulrahman Tariq

customer_reviews.title: Great size and style.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size because it fits my giant Dell precision m6600 which is a full 17.3. And it has room to spare so you could pop it a bigger laptop in the for sure. Its sturdy and padded. It also has a sleek minimal look that I enjoy. The only things negatives are the mesh drink holder is pretty flimsy and the bag doesnt stretch really at all so things get tight quickly which causes some pockets to be kinda useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Tymias

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bag. Sturdily constructed. Very spacious. Meets all you office/ travelling needs. Value for money. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Dushyant Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Protection
customer_reviews.text: Got this because wanted something with a hard front and padding for the laptop. I have kids and they have broken electronics before that have been in other back packs. Also i got it because it goes with my Lenovo laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Good bag but too stiff and no give.
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made. But way too stiff. Zippers have no give room. Can only fit a tiny amount in the backpack. It will fit a huge laptop yes. But not much else. Not a good but if you have a lot of gear like me.
customer_reviews.author: Ghast

customer_reviews.title: Heavy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy bag, uncomfortable on the shoulders unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Rami

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this case for protecting his laptop while at college. Sturdy with enough room inside for all the essentials.
customer_reviews.author: K. Eastman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and has a lot of space inside. Looks stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Armen

customer_reviews.title: ... laptop which I had a hard time finding something nice that it would fit in along with all my ...
customer_reviews.text: Backpack is HUGE and fits my MSI GT72VR Dominator Pro laptop which I had a hard time finding something nice that it would fit in along with all my accessories and books for college. Tons of pockets and extra storage and it looks/feels nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality; very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack as a present for my boyfriend. As a college student, $80 is a lot to spare, so when I spend that much, I want to get my money's worth. On the day the backpack arrived, my boyfriend used it one time and the zipper broke clean off. The backpack was not under any type of strain. I am incredibly disappointed, and the reviews have been terribly misleading. Do not buy this product. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our son. He absolutely loves it and quality seems good. It arrived with plastic she'll bent in, but our son wanted to keep it. Package was not great but so far back pack does well.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very durable . Loved the multiple pockets and extra cushioning the backpack has . My computer fits perfectly and very secure . Has a very professional look to it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kilgore

customer_reviews.title: Soooo many pockets and protectives layes ,must have.
customer_reviews.text: Super cool back pack for the price, a bit bigger than most regular back packs but that's good cuz back packs that Cary this much a soooo Much bigger in height
customer_reviews.author: LOADING...

customer_reviews.title: Quality Backpack
customer_reviews.text: It's actually A LOT more spacious than I thought it would be. There are so many pockets. Plus, it fits two of my laptops! Great backpack. I don't think you can go wrong with it. Also, the back support is AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: KyuubiGoku

customer_reviews.title: Great book bag
customer_reviews.text: I love my new book bag. Plus, it’s waterproof and I could pack my laptop in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweet bag
customer_reviews.text: Awsome laptop bag a bit narrow on the straps at the top portion but love the bag
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Durable and reliable backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is very durable and I can fit my 17.3” HP Omen laptop in there, with the charger, mouse, and mousepad, AND still with my school stuff. Not incredible amount of backpack space, but good enough for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: xiangxp

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED THIS!
customer_reviews.text: A bit bulky, as the bag is larger than I expected. Comfortably fits a 17" laptop and tons of accessories. Great bag for traveling! Best money I've spent in some time! YOU. NEED. THIS. BAG.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon313

customer_reviews.title: Omega level storage for your gaming gear.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Not only does it safely house my 17" Omen but all my accessories and still have alot of room left to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Olive

customer_reviews.title: Holds everything
customer_reviews.text: I use this instead of a briefcase for work. It has enough room and pockets to hold everything i need for work while on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Matt W

customer_reviews.title: that looks like it'll last a long time

product_meta.title: Lenovo Legion Armored 17 inch Gaming Backpack, maximum protection, weatherproof vinyl exoskeleton, full of pockets, for gamer, casual or college students, GX40L16533
product_meta.description: Color:Lenovo Y Gaming Armored BackpackFor gamers with a lot on their shoulders, the Lenovo Y armored gaming backpack more than delivers. With 3 compartments and 16 pockets, you'll be well-equipped to carry up to a 17. 3" laptop, a wide selection of peripherals, and all your other gaming essentials – there's even an inside latch designed specifically for your headset! The dedicated notebook compartment of this laptop backpack features high-quality bubble foam to protect your computer from the bumps and bruises of daily life. And to ensure your arsenal is protected from the outside, the Lenovo Y gaming armored backpack features a modified weatherproof vinyl exoskeleton and hard front shell. You can rely on Lenovo to think not only of protecting your computer with this 17-inch laptop backpack, but to provide for your comfort as well. The compression-molded back panel allows for airflow and breathability, making this bag easy on the back. Plus, cushioned adjustable shoulder straps are paired with a supporting chest buckle to make this gaming backpack easy to carry everywhere. Time to gear up! Specifications Product Dimensions (W x D x H): - (mm) : 360 x 180 x 505 - (inches) : 14. 17" x 7. 09" x 19. 88" Compartments: 3 Compatibility: Up to 17. 3" Notebook Unit Weight: Starting at 3. 02 lbs. (1. 37 kg) Material - Exterior: Polyester 60% and PU 40% - Interior: Polyester 100%
feature_bullets: Limitless storage potential – 3 compartments and 16 well-placed pockets give you the freedom to haul up to 17" Of Tech and all the peripherals you can imagine
Maximum protection – You may need an umbrella, but your backpack doesn't! With a hard, weatherproof exoskeleton, you'll be well-equipped for anything Mother Nature throws your way
Built for comfort – for your back, A compression-molded back panel providing airflow ventilation. For your shoulders, adjustable shoulder straps paired with a supporting chest buckle

Rugged and stylish – with sleek red Y icon and red-trimmed interior details combined with matte exterior with subtle red notes, you'll appreciate the combination of dependable protection and stylish appearance
Just the right size – weighing in at just 3. 02 lbs. And measuring 14. 17" X 7. 09" X 19. 88", This convenient laptop backpack won't be a weight on your shoulders
